meaning: to have as parts or members, or to be those parts or members
based on what is experienced or seen rather than on theory
a map of the world made in the shape of a ball and attached to a support, that can be turned around at the same angle as the earth turns in space
a way of operating, living, or behaving
to publicly support or suggest an idea, development, or way of doing something
to form an opinion or guess that something is true because of the information that you have
most extreme or important because either the original or final, or the best or worst
to give or offer something for a decision to be made by others
to repeat the words that someone else has said or written
fixed, certain, or clear
to prove that a belief or an opinion that was previously not completely certain is true
to give freedom or free movement to someone or something
to separate people or things into different levels of quality, size, importance, etc.
to not allow someone to have or do something
to provide a person or a place with objects that are necessary for a particular purpose
a model of something, or a very clear and typical example of something
someone or something that comes after another person or thing
using new methods or ideas
to help or support
being the only existing one of its type or, more generally, unusual, or special in some way
